[[Wraiths|Wraith]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Karsh''', originally born as '''Carthean''', is a hero of the [[Angmar]] faction. Karsh was invented by [[Electronic Arts]] for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology|The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'' series, where he is voiced by [[Jason Connery]]. ==History== Carthean was a celebrated [[Dúnedain of Arnor|Arnorian]] general. He defended [[Cardolan]], where the [[Barrow-downs|burial grounds of the deceased kings of Arnor]] lay, from the [[Witch-king]] and his servants. He failed, and at the end, [[Morgomir]] turned him into the [[Wraiths|wraith]] Karsh. Since then, Karsh is devoted to the Iron Crown of [[Angmar]]. [[Category:Men from adaptations]] [[Category:Undead from adaptations]] [[Category:The Battle for Middle-earth (video game series) characters]] [[fi:Karsh (pelihahmo)]]
